translations.translation: Then he showed him the Great Sign.
So he showed him the greater sign;
Then Moses (went to Pharaoh and) showed him the Great Sign;
Moses showed him the great miracle
So Moosa showed him a magnificent sign.
Then he showed him the great sign.
So he showed him the mighty sign.
So he showed him the great sign,
And he showed him the tremendous token.
Moses showed him the great sign,
Then he shewed him the great sign.
Then he showed him the greatest sign.
Then did (Moses) show him the Great Sign.
Then [Musa (Moses)] showed him the great sign (miracles).
He showed him the mighty sign,
He showed him the Greatest Miracle.
And he showed him the greatest sign,
[79:20] So he showed him the greatest sign, from among His nine signs, namely, the [glowing] hand or the [slithering] staff.
(And he) Moses (showed him the tremendous token) the hand and the staff.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَأَرَاهُ ٱلآيَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ } معناه يَدُهُ وعَصاهُ

translations.translation: And His saying, {the most great sign} means His hand and His staff.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما ذهب موسى لمقتضى أمر الله ووحيه إلى فرعون الطاغي الباغي، وبالغ في التبليغ وإظهار الدعوة، والملاينة على وجه الرفق والمداراة { فَأَرَاهُ } على سبيل التبيين والتوضيح { ٱلآيَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ } [النازعات: 20] يعني: العصا وتقليبها حيَّة، أو جنس الآيات النازلة عليه
